content: http://store.x12.org/store/limited-development-license for use in PAS development is now available to developers

Thanks I've started looking at the mappings. Since it's just a spreadsheet could we ask X12 to distribute it in a ZIP file? The current download is a Windows EXE file; I was able to get it to work but it caused some issues with our corporate security software. I suspect Mac users might also have problems.

Is anyone working on samples to show the mappings? It would be great to see a 278 and FHIR bundle side by side with the same data.
even though it states "purchase", I assume it is free?
Yes it's free. You have to add it to your cart but price is $0.
This link redirects to the products page in X12 website and I don't see an option to purchase or add to cart. Could someone confirm if they were able to use it recently?

@Gunjit Chhatwal
The FHIR PAS <-> X12 278 mappings are now located within the corresponding X12 5010 IGs within the X12 Glass product. All X12 members should have access to them there.
They are in-line for each element or as an appendix at the back.

Thanks, @MaryKay McDaniel . It is not available as part of free limited use license from X12 anymore. Is there a way to get it via DaVinci for development purpose and X12 license can be purchased when we are ready to deploy/use in PROD?
I can't speak for DV or X12... but, I would strongly encourage you reach out to X12 Directly at https://x12.org/products/licensing-program. Good things often happen to those who ask....:>))
